Title: Green Wing
Actors: Tamsin Greig, Pippa Haywood, Julian Rhind-Tutt, Stephen Mangan, Sarah Alexander, Karl Theobald, Katie Lyons, Lucinda Raikes, Mark Heap, Michelle Gomez, Oliver Chris, Olivia Colman, Sally Bretton
Plot: An offbeat comedy from the team behind 'Smack the Pony', set in a hospital, and is very much character-based, with storylines involving a staff liasion officer who hates people, a humourless consultant who thinks he's funny, and a handful of sexual predators and inadequates.
